text: Edward Robert Zeman (February 22, 1937 â€“ May 8, 2019) was an American football player and coach. He played as a defensive back. He played six seasons in the American Football League (AFL) from 1960 to 1966. He played for the Los Angeles Chargers/San Diego Chargers and Denver Broncos. He later had coaching roles at the Oakland Raiders, Denver Broncos, Buffalo Bills and the San Francisco 49ers. He was born in Geneva, Illinois. Zeman died on May 8, 2019, at the age of 82. ==References== ==Other websites== *Bob Zeman at Pro- Football-Reference.com * Category:1937 births Category:2019 deaths Category:American football coaches Category:American football safeties Category:San Diego Chargers players Category:Sportspeople from Illinois
title: Bob Zeman
